about_the_game:
FREE DEMO VERSION OF THE GAME SHOWS YOU A CAMPAIGN PROLOGUE AND INCLUDES TWO TUTORIAL STORY MISSIONS

You will be introduced to basic mechanics, setup of the story, four spartan soldiers and important story NPCs.

Join "Sparta" — here we fight bad guys for good money!

Dynamic Tactical Combat System

  • High lethality in battles — realistic amount of armor and health for both our characters and their enemies makes every attack potentially deadly;

  • Realistic tactics: there are no point-blank misses. Taking cover and flanking enemies matter and make the most difference;

  • Tactical overwatch mode with a cone of death, that covers a specific sector;

  • Free usage of action points — an attack doesn't end your turn;

  • Covers don't just lower chance to hit, but also convert full damage to scratches;

  • Vertical gameplay encourages taking and controlling heights.

Colorful African locations

Fights take place in slums, business districts, military bases and natural landscapes. This is Africa — no more moody grayscale — only sun, bright colors, and lots of details in locations.

Cinematic Effects and Destructible Environment

- Destructible covers and various decorative elements in locations;

- Some objects explode on hit;

- Cinematic Aiming Mode turns the game into a colorful action movie;

- Honest ballistics — bullets that didn't hit an enemy go past them and have a chance to hit another character or destroy something nearby.

10 Unique Veteran Soldiers and Unlimited Amount of Recruits

Every veteran has their own unique appearance, backstory, character traits, abilities, catchphrases, their point of view on events in Africa and their squadmates.

5 Character Classes With Various Abilities

Basic classes include: assault trooper, grenadier, machine gunner, sniper and specialist. Every class specializes in combat at their specific distance and serving their tactical roles. Every class has a unique set of abilities that you unlock while leveling, making a soldier more effective in the field.

Your Own Base of Operations That You Can Upgrade and Improve

You can build new blocks in the base to unlock additional gameplay features. Base is also where you hire new soldiers, manage rest and recovery of your squad.

Diverse Weaponry and Consumables

The system of contracts allows you to buy new weapons and various gear: smoke grenades, flashbangs, personal medkits, mines, tasers, and more.

Intelligent Enemies of Various Classes

Every enemy class has their own artificial intelligence that dictates their combat tactic. Enemies possess many different abilities and use a variety of weapons. You have to adapt and use different tactics against each of the enemy classes.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of modern combat: blood, corpses, acts of killing enemies, deaths of playable characters, occasional swearing. Also, realistic violence is sometimes mentioned in the game.

short_description: "Sparta 2035" is a turn-based tactics game in the spirit of a classic action movie. Control a squad of mercenaries, complete missions and liberate Africa from terrorists.
